FileSystemSyncAccessHandleGetSize.summary:
The getSize() method of the
interface returns the size of the file associated with the handle in bytes.

blockquote.para: Note: In earlier versions of the spec, , , getSize(), and were wrongly specified as asynchronous methods, and older versions of some browsers implement them in this way. However, all current browsers that support these methods implement them as synchronous methods.

remarks.para:
-File System API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

FileSystemSyncAccessHandleGetSize.returns: A number representing the size of the file in bytes.
